questions.name:
Read each definition and all four choices carefully, and find the answer that provides the best example of the given definition.
Applying for Seasonal Employment occurs when a person requests to be considered for a job that is dependent on a particular season or time of year. Which situation below is the best example of Applying for Seasonal Employment?

options.name: The ski instructors at Top of the Peak Ski School work from December through March.
Matthew prefers jobs that allow him to work outdoors.
Lucinda makes an appointment with the beach resort restaurant manager to interview for the summer waitressing position that was advertised in the newspaper.

questions.name: Violating an Apartment Lease occurs when a tenant does something prohibited by the legally binding document that he or she has signed with a landlord. Which situation below is the best example of Violating an Apartment Lease?

options.name: Tim has decided to move to another city, so he calls his landlord to tell him that he is not interested in renewing his lease when it expires next month.
Valerie recently lost her job and, for the last three months, has neglected to pay her landlord the monthly rent they agreed upon in writing when she moved into her apartment eight months ago.
Mark writes a letter to his landlord that lists numerous complaints about the apartment he has agreed to rent for two years.
Leslie thinks that her landlord is neglecting the building in which she rents an apartment. She calls her attorney to ask for advice.

questions.name: An Informal Gathering occurs when a group of people get together in a casual, relaxed manner. Which situation below is the best example of an Informal Gathering?

options.name: The book club meets on the first Thursday evening of every month.
After finding out about his promotion, Jeremy and a few coworkers decide to go out for a quick drink after work.
Mary sends out 25 invitations for the bridal shower she is giving for her sister.
Whenever she eats at the Mexican restaurant, Clara seems to run into Peter.

questions.name: The diagnostic term 'mental retardation' is finally being eliminated in the upcoming international classifications of diseases and disorders. Which situation below is the best example of a Mental Retardation?

options.name: Aakash has visited the dealership several times, but he still cannot decide which house to buy.
John’s report now includes both a component relating to mental functioning and one relating to individuals' functional skills .
Sandra diagnosed before age 18 that includes below-average general intellectual function, and a lack of the skills necessary for daily living.
Children may learn to sit up, to crawl, or to walk later like other children.

questions.name: If you rock the boat, you do or say something that will upset people by changing a situation that they don't want changed. Which situation below is the best example of rock the boat ?

options.name: One of two or more successive propulsion units of a rocket vehicle that fires after the preceding one has been jettisoned.
To process, in a specified area, troops which are in transit from one locality to another.
You shouldn't sit there and say everything's fine.
Then by degrees the churches grew too small to hold the great crowds of people who wished to see the plays.

questions.name: The definition of a wreck is something that has been destroyed, or a person who is upset or in poor health. Which statement is below a example of wreck ?

options.name: Devastatehorities have closed cafes, cinemas and tourist spots, empowering the local economies.
John is responsible to cause a relationship to fall apart and be destroyed.
These differences stem ultimately from their differing conceptions of God and of His relation to the world.
I will judge thee in the place where thou wast created, in the land of thy nativity.

questions.name: A person who does not seem very friendly is sometimes referred as Cold Fish. Which statement is below can be a best example of Cold Fish.

options.name: She's a lovely person, but her husband does not show his emotions.
Indifferent attitude of the local sheriff, the victims must take the law into their own hands.
She sat without a word, seemingly indifferent to my presence.
Sensual gratification that extends into a love of life.

questions.name: Starvation may be due to food scarcity in the society. This causes decreased supply of food to the whole of the population, and thus mass starvation may oc

options.name: Many organizations have been highly effective at reducing starvation in different regions.
Historically, starvation has been used as a death sentence.
Short of sitting in front of a potentially starving person and offering him or her food.
The share of starving people has decreased even faster.

questions.name: HIV/AIDS is a disease of the human immune system caused by infection with human immunodeficiency virus. As the illness progresses, it interferes more and more with the immune system, making the person much more likely to get infections.

options.name: HIV/AIDS is a global pandemic.
Having HIV or AIDS can lead to discrimination and dealing with stigma.
In the early years of the disease epidemic, the death rate from AIDS was low.
Always monitor how many calories you burn with sports and everyday activities.

questions.name: Sports are usually governed by a set of rules or customs, which serve to ensure fair competition, and allow consistent adjudication of the winner.

options.name: Sport is a major source of entertainment for non-participants.
Most people think that Sport is a rigorous form of exercise.
If one is already fit, he doesn’t need to involve in Sports Activities.
In organised sport, records of performance are often kept, and for popular sports, this information may be widely announced or reported in sport news
